snippet.title: SYNCED: Off-Planet | Meet the Nanos
snippet.description:
Premiered live at The Game Awards, it's time to meet the Nanos in SYNCED: Off-Planet. From brick walls with attitudes, to clairvoyant scouts, each Nano brings a different dynamic to suit your playstyle.

SYNCED: Off-Planet is a companion-based shooter set in a world devastated by technology. Fight together against enemy teams and synchronize with Nano companion classes to deploy in combat. As a runner, you've come to the place where it all went down: The Meridian, a forbidden zone that holds endless black Surge, deadly Nanos, and grand opportunity. You've come to fight for your fortune. Yet the Meridian is wide and the mysteries flow deep. What secrets await within?
-----------------------------------------------------------
Wishlist SYNCED: Off-Planet on Steam:
🔗 http://www.syncedoffplanet.com/

Follow the Official SYNCED: Off-Planet Channels:
➡ TWITTER - https://twitter.com/SyncedOffPlanet
➡ INSTAGRAM - https://www.instagram.com/syncedoffplanet/
➡ FACEBOOK - https://www.facebook.com/syncedoffplanet/
➡ DISCORD - https://discord.gg/syncedoffplanet

#SYNCEDOffPlanet #SYNCED #NextStudios
